data.name: Ragdoll Game
data.detailed_description:
Ragdoll Game is a 10-player physics based party game with various fun game modes to play. Compete against your friends or join strangers in a public lobbies using lobby browser.

Customize your character to look how you want by collecting items from playing to your Steam Inventory and stand out in a crowd.


  • Box Run - Be the last one standing on a platform of disappearing boxes
  • Don't Fall From The Platform (DFFTP) - Be the last one standing and jump from one platform to another to avoid falling down
  • Maze Escape - Be the first player to find an exit from a procedurally generated labyrinth
  • Bomb Tag - Be the last one standing in an exploding game of tag
  • Speedrun - Complete the parkour course as fast as you can, the fastest player wins.
  • More modes to come in later stages of the game

data.short_description: Ragdoll Game is a 10-player physics based party game with various fun game modes to play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 900 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
